virtual void fill (int value)=0

Detailed Description

A Sprite is either a bitmap to be drawn or an output of area for blitting other bitmaps, or both. They are created by the Driver.

virtual void Mangle::Rend2D::Sprite::fill ( int  value  )  [pure virtual]

Fill the sprite with the given pixel value. The pixel format depends on the format of the sprite.
